name: ERSGenerateUploadUri
description: Request a pre-signed URL to upload a file to a document store.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.documentation: The name of the file which will be uploaded, including extension. Format: ^.+\.(.+) /n Example: filename.txt

parameter.name: fileSize
parameter.documentation:
The size of the file in bytes. 
 Example: 10485760 (which is 10MB)

parameter.name: fileType
parameter.documentation:
The mimetype describing the nature of the document. 
 Example: text/plain 
 Binding (required): [MimeType](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/r4/valueset-mimetypes.html)

parameter.name: uploadUri
parameter.documentation: The pre-signed URL that can be used to upload the file.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.documentation: The binary reference which can be used later to download the uploaded file.
